description.p: A Connection_of_individual_product_with_involvements is a Connection_of_individual_product that is referenced by an Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection.
An Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection is a relationship between a connection between individual products and an individual product that is used to make the connection.

example.p: Pipe FW_102 and pipe FW_103 are both individual products. The pipefitting PF_99 that joins pipe FW_102 and pipe FW_103 is also an individual product.

The relationship between the pipefitting PF_99 and the connection between pipes FW_102 and FW_103, that indicates the pipefitting is used to make the connection, is an Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection.

note.p: The entity type Involvement_of_individual_product_in_connection defined in this part of ISO 10303 is identical to the entity type state_involved_in_connection defined in ISO 15926-2.

explicit.name: related_version
explicit.description: a Product_as_individual used to make the connection.
